about_the_game:
We need your help to get involved in other projects. That is why we kindly ask for support. Reward will give you access to "Bonus Content", where you can find:

  • Song lyrics and their listening
  • Links for downloading songs from Soundcloud
  • Links to YouTube video clips
  • And above all a warm feeling of soul and our great thanks :)
detailed_description:
We need your help to get involved in other projects. That is why we kindly ask for support. Reward will give you access to "Bonus Content", where you can find:

  • Song lyrics and their listening
  • Links for downloading songs from Soundcloud
  • Links to YouTube video clips
  • And above all a warm feeling of soul and our great thanks :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Ubuntu 14.04+, Debian 8+, openSUSE 13.1+, Fedora 21+
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mavericks 10.9 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory

name: Annotation of Love - Bonus Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 or newer
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

short_description: Support us and gain access to bonus content. Thank you :)
supported_languages:
English, German, Czech*
*languages with full audio support
